URL Bookmark App

A simple but effective app that allows you to bookmark webpages and view them at a later time.


Created using: HTML, Javascript, CSS, Bootstrap, jQuery and JSON


To save a bookmark, the user must enter the URL and a title. Local storage is used so that the user can access the bookmarks at a later time.
